name: funcidx
description: This function returns the ID of a public function by its name.

params_body.name: const name[]
params_body.description: The name of the public function to get the ID of.

return_values: The ID of the function (IDs start at 0). -1 if the function doesn't exist.
related_fn:
CallLocalFunction: Call a function in the script.
 CallRemoteFunction: Call a function in any loaded script.
